com.skratchdot.riff.wav
Interface Segment

All Known Implementing Classes:
SegmentImpl
public interface Segment

A representation of the model object 'Segment'.

The following features are supported:

  • Cue Point ID
  • Length In Samples
  • Number Of Repeats

See Also:
WavPackage.getSegment()
